name: Meja Dam
description: Major irrigation dam serving Bhilwara district. Constructed in 1968, this dam plays a crucial role in water management and agricultural irrigation for the region.

name: Khari Dam
description: Secondary irrigation reservoir built in 1975. This dam provides water for agricultural purposes and helps in maintaining the water table in the surrounding areas.

name: Mandalgarh Lake
description: Natural lake with historical significance. This beautiful water body has been a source of water for the local community for centuries and holds cultural importance in the region.

name: Kotri Dam
description: Primary water supply dam for southern Bhilwara. Constructed in 1982, this dam is essential for providing drinking water and irrigation to the southern regions of the district.

name: Sareri Check Dam
description: Rainwater harvesting structure built in 2005. This check dam helps in water conservation and recharging groundwater levels in the area.

name: Badnor Lake
description: Seasonal lake with agricultural importance. This water body fills during monsoon season and provides water for farming activities in the surrounding agricultural lands.

name: Raipur Dam
description: Medium irrigation project constructed in 1990. This dam supports local agriculture and helps in maintaining water availability throughout the year.

name: Gangapur Check Dam
description: Small water harvesting structure built in 2010. This check dam is part of the water conservation efforts in the region and helps in groundwater recharge.

name: Jahazpur Reservoir
description: Eastern district water supply reservoir constructed in 1988. This reservoir is crucial for providing water to the eastern parts of Bhilwara district.

name: Asind Lake of here
description: Major natural water body in northern region. This lake is an important source of water for both agricultural and domestic use in the northern areas of the district.

name: Banas River
description: Major river flowing through Bhilwara district. The Banas River is a significant water source and plays a vital role in the region's ecosystem and water supply.

name: Berach River
description: Important tributary river in the region. The Berach River contributes to the water resources and supports various water bodies and irrigation systems in the area.
